REGISTRES

R0 = 00000
$clk = 11110 (R30)

$sec = 00011 (R3)
$min = 00100 (R4)
$hrs = OO1O1 (R5)
$day = 00110 (R6)

$wek = 00111 (R7)

$mon = 01000 (R8)
$yea = 01001 (R9)

$bis = 01010 (R10)
$cen = 01011 (R11)
$fou = 01100 (R12)

$sxt = 01101 (R13)
$tfr = 01110 (R14)
$sev = 01111 (R15)
$lmo = 10000 (R16)
$twl = 10001 (R17)
$4   = 10010 (R18)
$100 = 10011 (R19)
$400 = 10100 (R20)
$60  = 10101 (R21)
$24  = 10110 (R22)
$7   = 10111 (R23)
$12  = 11000 (R24)
$x   = 11010 (R26)

MEMOIRE

$zer = 00000000 10000000
$mmm = 00000000 10000100

$in1 = 00000000 10001000
$in2 = 00000000 10001100
$in3 = 00000000 10010000
$in4 = 00000000 10010100
$in5 = 00000000 10011000
$in6 = 00000000 10011100
$in7 = 00000000 10100000
$in8 = 00000000 10100100
$in9 = 00000000 10101000
$in0 = 00000000 10101100

$aaa = 00000000 10110000 44*4
$bbb = 00000000 11101110 56*4

$zer 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 [128]
$mmm 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 [132]

$in1-9	[136-172] (Oui, on se garde un in10)

$aaa [176]
